last_episode_to_air.name: The Cooler
last_episode_to_air.overview: A DNA hit in the Bridget Shiel murder investigation identifies a compelling new suspect who was recently imprisoned for a double homicide; Benton investigates the death of a young man who was shot and killed while selling water on a hot summer day.

name: The First 48 Presents: Homicide Squad Atlanta
original_name: The First 48 Presents: Homicide Squad Atlanta
overview: Follow a group of Atlanta detectives working together to solve one open-ended case each season.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: In season 1, the detectives attempt to solve the murder of a young woman found naked and shot to death in a neighborhood park. Dubbed “Fallen Angel,” this case captured the hearts of the local community and the investigative team who worked tirelessly to find leads that could bring about justice for the young woman and her family.

episodes.name: Fallen Angel
episodes.overview: A beautiful teenager is found naked and shot to death in a city park. With no evidence to work with, rookie detective Andre Lowe struggles to unravel the mystery. But the viciousness of her mysterious death evokes the sympathy of the entire Homicide Unit who pitch in to identify her and recreate her last hours on earth from tiny clues. The case captures the hearts of the public and with tips flooding in, the detectives work round the clock to try to find her killer/killers. When her car is discovered miles away the mystery deepens.

episodes.name: The Dark Staircase
episodes.overview: The Fallen Angel investigation takes homicide detectives back to the scene of the crime. As they sweep the city park for evidence, they discover a surveillance camera with vital footage of the victim's car at the time of her murder. Detective Jamael Logan investigates the brutal murder of a young woman found beaten and shot to death in an Atlanta shopping center.

episodes.name: The Jealous Kind
episodes.overview: After an intense interrogation, Detective Logan finally gets his suspect to confess to brutally murdering Misha Moore over $8. DNA results on the Fallen Angel rape kit match the Sprite bottle bought by the woman seen in surveillance video and the unit investigates another lead. Detective Klein investigates the murder of a 16-year-old out on a double date who gets caught in a shootout with the other woman’s jealous boyfriend.

episodes.name: Secrets & Lies
episodes.overview: New leads emerge in the Fallen Angel case; in the heart of Atlanta's wealthiest neighborhood, a man is brutally beaten and shot to death.

episodes.name: Hot Sun, Cold Blood
episodes.overview: On the one-year anniversary of Bridget Shiel's brutal murder, Lowe organizes a vigil and canvass to try and generate new leads and give her family some resolution; Detective Zimbrick gets a DNA match on a 16-year-old cold case.

episodes.name: The Cooler
episodes.overview: A DNA hit in the Bridget Shiel murder investigation identifies a compelling new suspect who was recently imprisoned for a double homicide; Benton investigates the death of a young man who was shot and killed while selling water on a hot summer day.

Dubbed “Fallen Angel,” this case captured the hearts of the local community and the investigative team who worked tirelessly to find leads that could bring about justice for the young woman and her family.
